<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Song of Strength](/Feats.aspx?ID=1636) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[warrior muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Your performances inspire strength in your allies. You learn the [_song of strength_](/Spells.aspx?ID=732) composition cantrip.
name: Song of Strength
